Our external policies define service expectations, quality standards, and operational commitments. These documents provide transparency around our service delivery, AI usage, complaints handling, and clinical supervision frameworks.

Group Service Level Agreement

Comprehensive SLA defining service availability, response times, support channels, and quality commitments for group-level enterprise deployments.

Health Service Level Agreement

Dedicated SLA for health-focused services including clinical response times, escalation procedures, and therapeutic support commitments.

View Policy

AI Usage Policy

Transparent framework governing the ethical use of AI technologies, including data processing, algorithmic decision-making, and human oversight protocols.

View Policy

Complaints Policy

Structured process for raising, investigating, and resolving complaints with defined timescales and escalation pathways.

View Policy

Clinical Supervision Policy

Framework for ongoing clinical supervision, professional development, and quality assurance for therapeutic practitioners.
